field.label: Enable
field.comment: This block is shown only on the home page

field.label: Display mode of promo line
field.comment: Once - if closed will never showed again. Limited - will showed again after X days

field.label: Expires days
field.comment: Enter period of days. After the expiry of this period, the promo line will be displayed again

field.label: Footer Logo
field.comment: Upload logo image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

field.label: Footer copyright
field.comment: Put here your custom copyright content. HTML tags a allowed.

field.label: Facebook
field.comment: Type link here

field.label: Twitter
field.comment: Type link here

field.comment: Type link here

field.label: Instagram
field.comment: Type link here

field.label: Pinterest
field.comment: Type link here

field.label: Collapsible Sidebar Blocks
field.comment: Sidebar blocks: Compare, Wishlist, Reorder, Account navigation

field.label: Collapsible Layered Navigation Filters
field.comment: Layered Navigation Filter Titles

field.label: Category ID
field.comment: Put here Category ID to show new products from this category

field.label: Products Limit
field.comment: Enter number of products to show

field.label: Category ID
field.comment: Put here Category ID to show new products from this category

field.label: Products Limit
field.comment: Enter number of products to show

field.label: Products Limit
field.comment: Enter number of products to show

field.label: Category ID
field.comment: Put here Category ID to show new products from this category

field.label: Products Limit
field.comment: Enter number of products to show

field.label: Popup promo text
field.comment: Put here your html

field.label: Popup privacy text
field.comment: Put here your html

field.label: Static Block ID
field.comment: Default static block ID: contacts_page_info

field.label: Coordinates
field.comment: Set map center coordinates. You can copy them from the google map link. Fox example: 40.6700, -73.9400

field.label: Zoom
field.comment: Specify zoom level.

field.label: Scrollwheel
field.comment: If false, disables scrollwheel zooming on the map

field.label: Draggable
field.comment: If false, prevents the map from being dragged

field.label: Disable UI
field.comment: Disable Google Map user interface elements

field.label: Styles
field.comment: Google map styles. Can be taken from snazzymaps.com

field.label: Marker title
field.comment: Set title for marker

field.label: Marker coordinates
field.comment: Coordinates. Set coordinates of marker. You can copy them from the google map link. Fox example: 40.6700, -73.9400

field.label: Marker image
field.comment: Marker image filename (e.g. marker.png) It should be placed in pub/media/wokiee/marker/ directory.
click this after 'Save Config' if you changed colors. Be sure that exists folder pub/media/wokiee/ with 777 pemissions

field.label: Links 1 Background Hover
field.comment: For "Header2" Hover Type 2
